entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023
